title: FS2004 - FSDT Chicago O'Hare Airport (KORD) & Zurich (LSZH)
description:
FSDreamTeam Chicago O'Hare Airport (KORD) & Zurich (LSZH) For FS9


Chicago O'Hare airport scenery for FS9

Chicago O'Hare Airport is a scenery developed for Microsoft Flight Simulator X (FSX) and Flight Simulator 2004 ( FS9 ). It's has been created with great attention to visual quality and performance, using the latest available programming techniques, both in FSX and FS9.


Features:

- Fully customized ground and runways in high resolution, both in FSX and FS9. 
- Ground terrain seamlessly integrated with Flight Simulator. 
- Native animated inverse-kinematics based jetways in FSX. 
- AES support in FS9 
- Many animated custom ground vehicles. 
- Use of the advanced material properties in FSX, like bump and specular mapping. 
- Fully 3d taxiways lighting. 
- Intensive use of LOD techniques in order to offer the best possible performances. 
- Vegetation that reacts to seasonal changes, with customized snow-covered trees in winter. 
- High resolution building textures.


Requirements:

The FS9 version is compatible with FS9 with the 9.1 upgrade installed, and runs under Windows XP or Vista 32 bit edition.

The FSX version is compatible with FSX+SP2 minimum, or FSX+Acceleration Pack, under Windows XP or Vista 32 and 64 bit editions

===========

ZurichX airport scenery for FS9

ZÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¼rich Airport is a scenery developed for Microsoft Flight Simulator X (FSX) and Flight Simulator 2004 ( FS9 ). It's has been created with great attention to visual quality and performance, using the latest available programming techniques, both in FSX and FS9.


Features:

- Fully customized ground and runways in high resolution, both in FSX and FS9. 
- Ground terrain seamlessly integrated with Flight Simulator, in all seasonal variations. 
- Working safegates with automatic airplane recognition. 
- Native animated inverse-kinematics based jetways in FSX. 
- Many animated custom ground vehicles. 
- Use of the advanced material properties in FSX, like bump and specular mapping. 
- Fully 3d taxiways lighting. 
- Intensive use of LOD techniques in order to offer the best possible performances. 
- Vegetation that reacts to seasonal changes, with customized snow-covered trees in winter. 
- De-icing system modeled in 3D, available at 6 parking stands. 
- High resolution building textures. 
- Interiors modeled for the most important buildings.


Requirements:

The FS9 version is compatible with FS9 with the 9.1 upgrade installed, and runs under Windows XP or Vista 32 bit edition.
